name: Guardians of Legend MV
description:
Hello everyone,

Thank you for taking the time to look at this Description.

This is Guardians of Legend, and RPG that focuses on the Character named Badge. He is invited to one of his old friend's wedding but finds out that it is really a trap, since the Groom holds a knife toward his newly-wed wife. Now Badge has to find the 5 Masters of Light to seal the darkness that has taken over the world.
